import { memo } from "react"; import Flex from "../Flex/Flex"; import { Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionButton, AccordionPanel, AccordionIcon, Box } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import LinkButton from "../button/LinkButton"; import Button from "../button/button" const SideBar = () => { const { t } = useTranslation() return ( <>

{t("bscdat")}

{t("emplys")}

{t("bscdat")}

{t("bscdat")}

{t("bscdat")}

{t("bscdat")}

) } export default memo(SideBar)
